name: contaminant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that makes something less pure or makes it poisonous: Make sure that all equipment is clean and free of contaminants.

Add to word list
a substance that pollutes, spoils, or poisons something: High levels of contaminants have been found in the groundwater, causing concerns about possible health risks to nearby neighborhoods.
